description: Verified dependency checksums for Arkfile project

linux-amd64.notes: MinIO provides official SHA256 checksums and PGP signatures

verification_notes.minio: MinIO provides both SHA256 checksums and PGP signatures for verification.
verification_notes.rqlite: rqlite is now built from source (see scripts/setup/08-setup-rqlite-build.sh) and no longer uses pre-built binaries.
verification_notes.security_policy: All hashes in this file have been manually verified. Do not trust this file if it has been modified outside of version control.
